The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 04 August is 2,810 (325.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 July, there were 21 new confirmed cases (2.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 July, there were 43 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 51% (22 fewer cases).
